files.patch:
@@ -45,0 +45,3 @@
+  const Mutex::Rank WAITERS_LOCK_RANK = Mutex::safepoint - 5;
+  const Mutex::Rank CONTROL_LOCK_RANK = Mutex::nosafepoint - 2;

@@ -57,2 +60,2 @@

+    _alloc_failure_waiters_lock(WAITERS_LOCK_RANK, "ShenandoahAllocFailureWaiters_lock", true),
